title: Fake Disaster Relief

steps.text: URGENT: Hurricane victims need your help NOW! We're the Emergency Relief Foundation collecting donations. Every dollar goes directly to families who lost everything. Can you donate $50 to save lives? Time is running out!
steps.feedback: Always verify charities through official databases before donating, especially during disasters.

debrief: EMOTION + URGENCY + SOCIAL-PROOF: Charity scams exploit natural disasters and human compassion. They create false urgency ('time is running out') and emotional appeals ('save lives') to pressure quick donations. Always verify charities through sites like Charity Navigator or GuideStar before giving.
